subject: College Athletics
organizations: State University of New York at Geneseo
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has barred the men’s hockey teams at Buffalo State and the State University of New York at Geneseo from postseason play this year for violating financial aid rules.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has barred the men’s hockey teams at Buffalo State and the State University of New York at Geneseo from postseason play this year for violating financial aid rules.
